item.title: Zelensky warns against giving away territory as latest Ukraine talks end
item.description: There was optimism following the talks in Geneva, but no details emerged on how to bridge the huge divide between Moscow and Kyiv over territory and s...

item.title: 'Slender Man' stabber who knifed her classmate 19 times aged 12 captured after escape
item.description: Morgan Geyser who stabbed a classmate nearly to death in 2014 to please online character Slender Man was caught at a truck stop.

item.title: Belgian airports to be hit by 'major disruption' amid austerity strike
item.description: Three days of industrial action are set to affect public services and transport across the country.

item.title: What is Cartel de los Soles, which the US is labelling as a terrorist organisation?
item.description: The US says it is headed by Venezuela's president and other senior politicians, but some analysts say it does not even exist.

item.title: I watched helplessly as gunmen snatched my son, says father after Nigerian school kidnapping
item.description: The authorities are trying to rescue more than 250 schoolchildren who were abducted by raiders on motorbikes.
